column4: What do people here use as a music application.. i always used iTunes as i was  mac user but looking to see what other people use.
SONGBIRD!
go to www.getdeb.net and search for Songbird
cool ill check it out thanks
Kinda good, mostly doesn't matter though
alrighty.. im gonna go to that link and see if i can install Songbird
Easy, go to Edit > Preferences and then select Music management. Then tell it where your music folder is :)
cool thanks
what if im trying to import a CD?
OH! forgot to tell you, in preferences go to media importer then check that box
search Add/Remove for CD Ripper
alright im gonna do that now
The Songbird dudes are working on adding CD ripping. Should be done in about a month :)
cool cool.. hey i typed CD Ripper in my add/remove applications and have All Available Applications chosen but its not coming up with anything
.... Well then search for Audio CD Extractor.
thanks ill give it a try.. im sure ill find it
Its a bug :(  You'll have to reboot to get your icons back
Seems like thats happened to me...
yeah and after restarting my icons havnt come back.. its weird.  I feel like im doing something wrong and everything is just hiding on me :(.
Dude, I am kinda lost :|  You might want to start a thread on the Ubuntu Forums
Hey after that restart all my desktop icons are back haha
